description: Will not open. No way to test.
Does a very good job at openning.

Currently I'm learning JavaScript and usually use CodePen as an online editor since it's easy to write on one side and immediately see the output on the other without a hassle. Because of this, once I heard what Playhouse was, I was really excited to try it.

After using it for a bit, I'm noticed the following:

01. The app still has a lot of bugs. After changing the devtools' alignment the whole app crashes.

02. The user cannot change the font size in the HTML, CSS & JavaScript editors. This feature is so basic that I'm surprised they developed the app without considering this.

03. Lack of Emmet-like features, helping the user write code quickly via auto-complete and intelligent suggestions.

Right now I'm uninstalling the app but I will try it again later to see how much it has improved. I personally feel that the app has a great potential, but right now it's too young and unrefined.
summary: App has great potential but lacks a few fundamental features

description: Playhouse is a great tool for prototyping and also to teach people about web technologies. Some form of autocompletion would be the icing on the cake. Happy to confirm that it works on Fedora 37 (:

New to learning frontend stuff, this seems to work well. Bye-bye codepen!
A cool feature to add would by code completion/suggestion.
or open folder, it's a very good application but maybe we download it because of the previewer
summary: I hope it can have a open file function

description:
Hope it gets auto complete like vs code. And an open folder functionality to open an existing project.
Btw its really good I thing not having autocomplete helps me recall everything hence, revision is happening
summary: Its a really good live preview app

description:
Currently there is a bug in webkit with proprietary nvidia cards. My app wouldn't show anything without adding an environment variable. I have to run it with: WEBKIT_DISABLE_COMPOSITING_MODE=1 flatpak run re.sonny.Playhouse 

according to: https://bugs.webkit.org/show_bug.cgi?id=180739

No autocompleta nada, nes más bien para jugar a ser maquetador, no hacen falta etiquetas siquiera, estaría bueno que se pueda usar como el resto de editores con esa vsita previa y las herramientas de desarrollo abajo estaría muy bien.-

Le logiciel est bien pensé avec une interface agréable avec des fonctionnalités simple mais bien pensé.
Ce n'est ni une révolution ni quelque chose à jeté.
On regrettera l'impossibilité d’exporté les données et les lagues et autre crash à l'utilisation du click droit ou a la manipulation de la fenêtre.

Le tout reste utilisable & utile, faite vous votre propre avis.
